sentences.sContent: If you can't limn the character, don't say it's the character.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you can't limn the character, don't say it's the character.
sentences.sCn: 如果你不能描写的特点，并没有说这是性格。

sentences.sContent: To limn their portraits, stately, beautiful, and emulate at will.
sentences.sContent_eng: To limn their portraits, stately, beautiful, and emulate at will.
sentences.sCn: 绘出他们描绘的图景，宏伟，美丽，随意地模仿。
